title: Israelgogo
author: Israelgogo
content: Having a positive mindset work greatly with actions, putting more effort and believing what will be will surely be ,you cant control nature, you can only work towards it and put in more efforts. No matter what you do in life ,if it not your time then it wont be as you planned it,you can only force it but you cant determine the outcome. Put in your best and see what comes out of it and dont do things that will make you regret in the end.

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: Having a positive mindset is vital in all areas of life. Believe in yourself, be positive & work hard. Treat others as you would like to be treated & good things will come to you. Life is too short for negativity & wallowing in self doubt & pity.

comments.author: Cryptodebjoe
comments.body: I personally feel that our future is a function of our todays input if we can create a clear picture in our minds as to where we want to be or who we want to be in 5 years from now then delibrately take actions we'll get there yes sometimes there may be challenges but we can pull through... What we want will be
